Hero.description: The only cross-border payment infrastructure built for global merchants to accept payments from Indian customers and businesses without local entity setup.

Section2.heading: Why Global Merchants Lose 70% of Indian Customers
Section2.subheading: Without local payment infrastructure, you're leaving money on the table

issues.title: Payment Failures
issues.description: International cards face 40-60% failure rates on Indian payment gateways

issues.title: Complex Compliance
issues.description: Setting up Indian entity requires 6-12 months and heavy regulatory overhead

issues.title: Delayed Settlements
issues.description: Traditional gateways hold funds for 7-15 days in Indian accounts

issues.title: Limited Methods
issues.description: Missing UPI & local wallets means losing 70% of potential customers

Features.heading: Accept INR. Start in 48 Hours.

featuresList.title: Local INR Collection

featuresList.title: 99%+ Success Rate
featuresList.description: Industry-leading payment success with intelligent routing and retry logic

featuresList.title: No Local Setup

featuresList.title: Subscription Ready

featuresList.title: Licensed Infrastructure
featuresList.description: RBI-licensed, PCI-DSS compliant, and partnered with major Indian banks

HowToStart.heading: How to register & start?
HowToStart.subheading: Get started in 4 simple steps. From registration to going live in under 48 hours.

stepsList.title: Register with Company Documentation
stepsList.description: Submit your company details and business documentation. Our team reviews within 24 hours.

stepsList.title: Fully Digital Verification
stepsList.description: Complete KYC verification digitally. No need for Indian entity or physical presence.

stepsList.title: Integrate Payment Modes
stepsList.description: Add our SDK or API to your website. Clear documentation and dedicated support available.

stepsList.title: Start Collecting
stepsList.description: Go live and start accepting payments from Indian customers. Settlements to your global account.

UPISection.heading: UPI: India's Payment Infrastructure Revolution
UPISection.subheading: 60% of India's digital payments run on UPI. Access 900M+ internet users and 10B+ monthly transactions.
UPISection.imageText: Only 4 of many reasons why UPI is the way to go in India.

statsList.subDescription: Driving demand for global brands and premium products

UPIIntegration.heading: Four UPI Payment Methods. One Integration.
UPIIntegration.subheading: Accept payments through all major UPI channels with EximPe's RBI-licensed infrastructure.

featuresList.title: UPI Intent Flow
featuresList.description: Seamlessly redirect users to their preferred UPI apps (Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm) without needing to enter VPA or UPI ID

featuresList.title: QR Code Payment
featuresList.description: Give customers a familiar QR-based checkout experience on desktop. Simply scan and pay with any UPI app

featuresList.title: UPI ID / Phone Number
featuresList.description: Enable payments via UPI ID (VPA) or phone number as a reliable fallback option for all scenarios

featuresList.title: No-Code Payment Links
featuresList.description: Create shareable payment links and QR codes for products or services. Copy, paste, and share via email, SMS, or WhatsApp—no website required.

LicensedInfrastructure.heading: Built on Licensed Indian Payment Infrastructure

featuresList.title: 90+ Bank Network
featuresList.description: Direct integration with India's public and private banking infrastructure

featuresList.title: UPI AutoPay Ready
featuresList.description: RBI-compliant recurring payments for subscription businesses up to ₹2.5L/month

featuresList.title: Real-Time Processing
featuresList.description: Instant payment confirmation with 99%+ success rates on UPI transactions

featuresList.title: Complete Compliance

BusinessModels.heading: Built for Every Business Model
BusinessModels.subheading: From subscriptions to marketplaces, EximPe powers payments for diverse global businesses

businessModelsList.title: E-Commerce
businessModelsList.subtitle: Via Shopify or D2C websites
businessModelsList.challenge: High cart abandonment due to limited payment options for Indian customers
businessModelsList.solution: Seamlessly integrate with Shopify or your D2C site to accept UPI, wallets, and local cards

businessModelsList.title: Marketplaces
businessModelsList.subtitle: With multiple merchants on their platform
businessModelsList.challenge: Complex cross-border settlement and compliance with multiple vendors
businessModelsList.solution: Split payments, escrow management, and automated multi-party settlements

businessModelsList.title: SaaS
businessModelsList.subtitle: For Subscription Services
businessModelsList.challenge: Indian customers cannot pay for international subscription services
businessModelsList.solution: Accept recurring payments in INR with automated billing and dunning management

businessModelsList.title: Payment Service Providers
businessModelsList.subtitle: Payment companies serving merchants globally
businessModelsList.challenge: Foreign payment companies struggle to offer Indian payment methods to their merchants
businessModelsList.solution: White-label API to extend your payment stack with comprehensive India coverage

businessModelsList.title: Merchant On Record
businessModelsList.subtitle: Entities collecting on behalf of other businesses
businessModelsList.challenge: Compliance complexity when collecting payments on behalf of multiple businesses in India
businessModelsList.solution: Comprehensive compliance coverage, tax handling, and multi-entity settlement workflows
